bug.short_desc: pulp-server and python-pulp-streamer rpms both provide the pulp_streamer.service systemd unit
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
pulp-server and python-pulp-streamer rpms both provide the pulp_streamer.service systemd unit. Only the python-pulp-streamer package should provide this unit. This issue was reported upstream[0], but as it is a problem in the spec file it needs to be fixed here as well.
[0] https://pulp.plan.io/issues/1924
This package has changed ownership in the Fedora Package Database. Reassigning to the new owner of this component.
